similar_tickets.test_steps: 1. AWD payment processes successfully. 2. Trigger real-time sync to CRM. 3. Verify AWD status field updates in CRM. 4. Confirm last payment date syncs. 5. Validate payment amount syncs. 6. CSR views synced AWD info in CRM. 7. Verify sync latency under 30 seconds
similar_tickets.expected_result: 1. AWD payment should process. 2. Sync should trigger automatically. 3. CRM status should update. 4. Payment date should be accurate. 5. Amount should match source. 6. CSR should see correct info. 7. Sync should complete within 30 seconds
